message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $100, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking maybe we could meet in the middle at $95? Would that work for you?
I'm glad we're close, Bob. I can do $105, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still think we can do better. How about $98? It's a fair compromise, considering the product is worth $80 to you
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I can see that you really want the product. I'm willing to meet you at $110, but that's as high as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $105, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?
I think we're getting close, Bob. I can do $108, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. What do you think?
I'm not willing to go above $105, and I'm not sure I can go any higher. I'm willing to meet you at $107, but that's my final offer. Can you accept it?
